description:
## Japplis Clipboard History - Show Text Clipboard History

![Screenshot of Japplis Clipboard History](https://www.japplis.com/clipboard-history/images/clipboard-history-screenshot.png)

Clipboard History is a freeware that remembers the text copied in the clipboard from other applications. 
        You can see the list of previous copied text and put them back in the clipboard.
      It can also run always on top, translucent or inside an IDE such as IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, Eclipse or NetBeans.
author: Japplis
